snippet.title: Laysara: Summit Kingdom ‒ Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Laysara: Summit Kingdom on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1823950

Build and expand your very own settlements in high mountains! Carefully plan production chains and satisfy various needs of your three-caste society while dealing with mountain hazards such as weather breakdowns and avalanches. Are you skilled enough to make your town thrive?

Website: https://quiteokgames.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/QuiteOKGames

--
Attribution:

Music & sound by Bartek Pokrywka BPM Music (www.bpmmusic.pl)

Key art by Maciej Drabik.

Pine tree model based on Fir Tree Stylized by AnnaBelle Fibonacci shared on https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ license. Textures and geometry heavily modified.

UI Icons downloaded from https://game-icons.net/ shared on https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/ license. Some icons have undergone subtle changes.

Yak icon by Grégory Montigny from the Noun Project.
